SELECT * FROM ( SELECT @rownum:=@rownum+1 AS num , user_id , name , pw , email , phone , channel , DATE_FORMAT(reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as reg_date , DATE_FORMAT(last_login_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as last_login_date , email_chk , talk_chk , sms_chk , auth_type FROM daul.user , (SELECT @rownum:=0) TMP WHERE 1=1
AND auth_type = #{auth_type}
AND user_id like concat('%', #{search}, '%')
AND name like concat('%', #{search}, '%')
AND email like concat('%', #{search}, '%')
AND phone like concat('%', #{search}, '%')
AND auth_type != 'admin'
AND user_id like concat('%', #{search}, '%')
AND name like concat('%', #{search}, '%')
AND email like concat('%', #{search}, '%')
AND phone like concat('%', #{search}, '%')
AND last_login_date >= date_format(concat(#{search_s_date}, ' 00:00:00'), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
